generated_description: ortho pauher is a brazilian company based in recife, pernambuco, specializing in the manufacturing of orthopedic and podiatric silicone and polymer gel products. founded in 1995, the company has established itself as a world leader in the industry, exporting its products to over 50 countries. ortho pauher is known for its high-quality products, which are designed to support rehabilitation and provide comfort. the company employs over 280 people and holds several certifications, including anvisa, fda, and ce. ortho pauher's product portfolio includes items such as foot care products, surgical positioners, mastectomy and gel sheets, physiotherapy and fitness aids, and thermotherapy products.
